title: Anyone absolutely despise the new jungle?
body: I can't play it any more. It feels like there is very little room to earn money. I can't do any of my favourite tricks/invades/ganks becasue they put me too far behind or I am constantly surviving at 200hp in the jungle. Thoughts?

replies.body:
Learn to adapt. Find the new jungle item/enchantment that fits your champion.


{{item:3711}} Poachers is for your counter junglers, you would take it on say Udyr{{champion:77}}  and Shyvana{{champion:102}} .
{{item:3713}} Rangers is for quick farming and split pushing, great for champs like Rengar{{champion:107}} , Yi{{champion:11}} , Udyr{{champion:77}} , Shyvana{{champion:102}} .
{{item:3706}} Stalkers is your ganking item, you want it on Amumu{{champion:32}} , Lee Sin{{champion:64}} , Elise{{champion:60}} , Rengar{{champion:107}} .
{{item:3715}} Skirmishers is your duelist item, you want it on Trundle{{champion:48}} , Yi{{champion:11}} , Udyr{{champion:77}} , Tryndamere{{champion:23}} , Aatroxx{{champion:266}} .

Then you have your enchantments, they depend on what you are doing.
Personally so far I have found that Ranger's Trailblazer with Warrior {{item:3723}} is great on Rengar.
I can't wait to explore the new jungle further and learn it and it's secrets.

Change your pathing. The old paths don't work that well anymore unless you have a sustain jungler like {{champion:19}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:60}} or someone like that.

Don't smite on cooldown. Think about the bonus buffs you are getting.
2xjunglers & 3xsololaners should be the new norm of meta. There is so much gold in the jungle now I don't know what you are talking about. Early dragons too should always be highly contested.
This jungle is not really new, its old. Last season was a new jungle.

> This jungle is not really new, its old. Last season was a new jungle.

whut....everything, and i mean EVERYTHING got changed...nothing is like it was. last season nothing really changed...season 3 was when jungle had the last big change...season 4 was just more of the same...
